name: Qomp2
summary:
An artful reimagining of Pong, qomp2 picks up the story where the delightful indie platform-puzzler qomp left off in 2021.

Control a Pong ball aching to break free of its life stuck between two paddles. Explore a dangerous, minimalist world, armed with simple two button controls: tap a button to change direction by 90 degrees, and hold down a button to unleash a cathartic dash forward. Thatâ€™s all you need to solve environmental puzzles and labyrinthine levels. Around each corner is a new challenge that will test your two-button and problem-solving skills. A variety of difficult enemies and bosses help you mark your time as you navigate through 30 levels spread across four worlds.

A cerebral puzzler lies within the heart of this indie twist on Pong.

name: Qop 4
summary: Qop 4 is a minimalistic puzzle which goal is to get the cube to finish using 4 directions in space.

name: Qomp
summary:
You control the ball on its journey to freedom.

In qomp you use only a single button to defeat bosses, solve puzzles and overcome platforming challenges.
At the end of your journey lies freedom.
Or does it?

name: Qorbit
summary:
Qorbit is an easy to play arcade puzzler with interesting game mechanics.
Unlock cosmic objects which give you certain advantages in the game, collect points and start cosmic event and collect man-made space objects like the space shuttle!

name: qop: DLC
summary: In this DLC you get 12 new levels for qop.

name: Qora
summary: A mysterious trip to gorgeous and surreal lands, players explore the unknown and harness mystical powers which have been hidden in the valley for centuries.

name: QotU
summary: Two friends stand alone in an abandoned courthouse, wondering where everything went wrong. And yet they know that there's only one path forward for them after everything that's happened. This is the story of Chihiro Ayasato, a former surgeon who disappeared from public life one day and re-emerged as the most trusted confidant of Urami Shikabane, head of Osaka's most prominent yakuza family.

name: QontoWars
summary: A multiplayer FPS game with a sci-fi/space-like atmosphere, with a focus on versatility of gamemodes, maps, weapons and weapon/player skins
